item.title: FPGA Video Denoising and Segmentation (Y2 Summer Project)
item.description: Y2 Summer Project Introduction For the Imperial EEE Department, the Y2 Summer Term project was to: Design and build a balancing rover (Segway), that can autonomously navigate and map a maze, with the assistance of three beacons. Finally, the shortest path through the maze should be computed and followed. A prototype of the design must be built and tested on the artificial maze in the lab. The maze is laid out with light strips on an arena.
